thread.section_title: Motorama Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Motorama | motorama.com.au | 2 of 37
thread.title: Raisa

author: Raisa
title: Raisa
text: I just needed a car, so I took my daughter for assistance and viewed the cars in the yard, luckily Jack greeted us and so forth; before you know it we were out the driveway within days. Great and fast service, satisfied with information on the variety of cars; finance; accessories; the package. Found the staff to be friendly all with a cheerful smile,will refer you to any of our family and friends. Thanking you, a Happy Customer..
